title: Winds of Chaos
description: Haskia is coming.Itothia prepares to defend its borders as the ruthless regent of Haskia marches on Vahn’alem. In the chaotic aftermath of the king’s death and the attack on Varle, the noble houses are divided and the country is ill-prepared to face the oncoming battle. Defeat seems inevitable.Thaleon and Dawyn travel to Vahn’alem, hoping to save Itothia by using a terrifying spell devised by the most hated and feared valekyn in history. Their journey won’t be easy, and they will have to face more than Haskia’s fearsome army at its end—Rielaron Vold, the regent of Itothia and Thaleon’s former close friend, is leading the war efforts at Vahn’alem, and she will likely kill them on sight.As the brothers confront old friendships and the unpleasant truths of Itothia’s dark past, the price of their decision may prove higher than they could have imagined.
author: N.K. Leem
